nodes.text: You lean over the opening and take in the access ladder.

Galvanized rungs, clean enough to offend the surrounding concrete.
A fall-arrest anchor is installed, tagged, and—this is the odd part—dated this quarter. That makes your jaw tighten, just a little.

A laminated card hangs from the anchor: “DESCENT PROCEDURE: THREE POINTS OF CONTACT. DO NOT LINGER.”
“Do not linger” is underlined twice, like it’s personal.
